data.message:
I would love so much to go on the 10th of December to see Ed Sheeran! He met my dad in Afghanistan in 2014 and I would love to meet him also, my dream has always been to sing with him. He’s one of my inspirations for my music and me and my mums favourite singer!☺️❤️ Taking along with me my one and only Mum Jo Lewis! 
#capitalfm #capitalJBB #holidaysarecoming #cocacola #motheranddauggter

replies.message: I used to go to the same college as him. Access to music if you've heared of it or been

Lovely bloke, his story is truly inspirational, he was homeless for over two years & he would have to decide if he should get food or buy a train ticket to go & perform somewhere-so he wouldn't eat some days. He was willing to do whatever it took to be successful & he made it! He is, of course a naturally gifted
